remarks: Base case of the induction in ~ mreexexd .  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
mreexexlem2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( Moore ` X ) ) $.

mreexexlem2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> A. s e. ~P X A. y e. X A. z e. ( ( N ` ( s u. { y } ) ) \ ( N ` s ) ) y e. ( N ` ( s u. { z } ) ) ) $.
mreexexlem2d.5 $e |- ( ph -> F C_ ( X \ H ) ) $.
mreexexlem2d.6 $e |- ( ph -> G C_ ( X \ H ) ) $.

mreexexlem3d.9 $e |- ( ph -> ( F = (/) \/ G = (/) ) ) $.
mreexexlem3d $p |- ( ph -> E. i e. ~P G ( F ~~ i /\ ( i u. H ) e. I ) ) $.
